text: Samuel Gordon Davie (7 July 1903 – 18 February 1941) was an Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * *Gordon Davie's profile at Collingwood Forever Category:1903 births Category:1941 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players
title: Gordon Davie
